readable.title: 3150440350_b0f2a9e774
readable.content: A man dressed in a military uniform bends over to speak to a person sitting on the sidewalk . A man in sailor whites talks to a person seated on the ground . a man sitting on the floor crying while another man is trying to comfort him . A pilot is bending down to assist a man that is crying . A sailor is checking on a man who is sitting on the ground crying .
